Posts.EditableText: Anyone else getting "Server Error in '/' Application." with the subheading "Runtime error" when trying to play games online. Really frustrating since I'm on a macbook and don't have access to a PC atm. Does anyone have a fix for this or is it just cross your fingers that the site fixes itself?

Posts.EditableText: Unfortunately nothing you can do, and the only thing I can do is ask someone else to resolve it. However, it has now been fixed.
